description: Treize is the charming, charismatic leader of Oz - and of the Specials, the elite Earth Alliance taskforce which serves as Oz`s disguise. He is a pure aristocrat, who lives by a code of chivalry and conducts himself as a gentleman even while plotting cruel treachery and bloody revolution. Treize`s wicked schemes are rooted in a nobleman`s conviction that conflict and war serve to strengthen and improve the human spirit. He is admired by Oz`s soldiers; feared by his Alliance superiors; and a close, trusted friend to ace pilot Zechs Merquise.
name: Treize Khushrenada
